item.description:
Hello Coffee Talk Members:

Please join us at the Yale Art Gallery to check out the art collection and any new rotating exhibits they may have acquired this year,

http://artgallery.yale.edu/

artgallery.yale.edu/

and then we will head over to Willoughby's Tea & Coffee at the
Yale School of Architecture to talk about Yale's collection.

http://www.willoughbyscoffee.com/locations.php

www.willoughbyscoffee.com/locations.php

 

Thought we would get some art and culture in,

in addition to enjoying a really good cup of coffee.

We will be meeting in the lobby of the Yale Art Gallery at 3 pm,

spend approximately 1 hour at the Art Gallery and

then walk over to Willoughby's at 4 pm.

Yale Art Gallery (Entrance is Free, donations not required but warmly welcomed.)

Willoughby's (At your own cost.)

Cheers,

Swadhi

Your Assistant Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby of the Yale Art Gallery.
item.name: Yale Art Gallery & Willoughby's Coffee at the Yale School of Architecture
